server.version: The Server Version, when change then update the file 'index.html' in folder 'public' to reflect the change in Version TAG
server.portToListen: TCP Port used for listen on server
server.verboseDatabaseRequest: Used for indicate if a Database Request log info through console
server.useCluster: Indicates if this server must use a CLUSTER of instances

database.databaseSchema: The DB Schema, must be without the brackets '[]'

options.Encrypt: If you are on Windows Azure, please use the value 'true' on this property in database > options > encript
options.InstanceName: If the connection will be on a named instance of SQL Server, please add the property 'instanceName': 'SQL_SERVER_INSTANCE_NAME' to 'options' node of database section.
